text: Mobb Deep was an American hardcore hip hop duo formed in 1991. Its members were rappers Havoc and Prodigy. Their best-known albums are The Infamous (1995), Hell on Earth (1996) and Murda Muzik (1999),Shapiro, Peter, 2005, The Rough Guide To Hip-Hop, 2nd Edition, Penguin, p. 259. and their best-known singles are "Shook Ones (Part II)" and "Survival of the Fittest." They were known for their dark and hardcore delivery.Shapiro, Peter, 2005, The Rough Guide To Hip-Hop, 2nd Edition, Penguin, p. 258-259. The duo ended when Prodigy died in June 2017 at age 42. == References == Category:1991 establishments in New York (state) Category:American rap music groups Category:Musical duos Category:Musical groups from New York City Category:Musical groups established in 1991 Category:Musical groups disestablished in 2013 Category:1990s American music groups Category:2000s American music groups Category:2010s American music groups
title: Mobb Deep
